entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: W 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
